column5: My place is great for multiple couples and big family. We also can provide play pin for your infant to sleep in.  Tv is in common area. Sheets, towels and toiletries will be provided. Gated community. We are only 7 minute drive from SeaWorld and 20 mins from Six Flags Fiesta Texas. We are right off highway 1604,so it's easy to commute. Reach out to me if you have any additional questions or requests.
